basics.name: Sefa Enes ERGIN
basics.label: AI/ML Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer currently pursuing an MSc in Computer Science and Engineering at 國立中山大學 in Taiwan, specializing in machine learning, deep learning, and AI hardware. My studies are driven by a strong desire to work at TSMC and advance his expertise in Taiwan’s thriving semiconductor and AI ecosystem. I have been honored with prestigious scholarships such as the Taiwan Government Scholarship and the Huayu Enrichment Scholarship.

work.summary:
About:
American Realty Network LLC., a leading commercial real estate company that helps clients find, buy, sell, lease and manage commercial properties in the United States.
highlights: I work on the development, maintenance, and security of the web software for the following sites.
I use WordPress, PhP, and Google.
work.name: American Realty Network LLC.

awards.title: Taiwan Scholarship
awards.summary: The Taiwan Scholarship is a scholarship for international students who possess prior excellent academic performance and good moral character.

awards.title: Huayu Enrichment Scholarship
awards.summary: The MOFA (Ministry of Foreign Affairs) Huayu Enrichment Scholarship (HES), is a competitively awarded international scholarship for studying the Mandarin language in Taiwan. This scholarship was awarded to me by ROC(Republic of China)-Taiwan for 1 year.

references.name: Eric Nur
references.reference: Sefa is an engineer characterized by his ability to self-learn, his sense of responsibility, reliability, and adept communication skills. He consistently endeavors to fulfill every task assigned to him with diligence, utilizing feedback to refine his areas of improvement. Furthermore, he proactively offers constructive suggestions to his team members to aid in their professional development. I am confident in his ability to add significant value to any team he joins.

references.name: Ahmet Melih ILTER
references.reference: Sefa is an enthusiastic and motivated learner, always willing to contribute and take on new challenges. While he may not be the most efficient developer, as he is in his early stages of his career, his eagerness to learn and positive attitude make him a valuable asset to any team. His willingness to collaborate and seek feedback from his colleagues is one of his strengths. He is always open to learning and actively seeks out opportunities to improve his skills. His commitment to continuous learning and development is truly admirable.

references.name: Mert Sen FINDICAK
references.reference: One of his greatest strengths is his ability to work collaboratively with others. He is a natural team player who is always willing to lend a hand and help out wherever he can. He is also an excellent communicator, both verbally and in writing, which makes him an effective liaison between team members and stakeholders. Furthermore, he has an impressive technical skillset that includes proficiency in various programming languages, as well as experience with software development.
